detectors.description:
Address.isContract(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PausableERC20.sol#266-275) uses assembly

PausableERC20.notPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PausableERC20.sol#359-362) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(msg.sender == _admin || _paused == false,transfer is paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PausableERC20.sol#360)
detectors.markdown:

	-[require(bool,string)(msg.sender == _admin || _paused == false,transfer is paused)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PausableERC20.sol#L360)
